name: DinnerDash
description:
This is a 4 player chef arena game based around gathering burger parts in the corners of the screen and building a burger to throw at the opponents. If you have a full burger you will instantly kill your opponents but if you wanna use abilities you have to burn certain gathered ingredients! You can trade ingredients at chef tables to regain heath by pressing triangle(Y).

Figure out all the special moves on your own!

Only playable using a Console Controller currently.
